description.0: A longbow that burns like a flame. The feathers that adorn it are said to have come from the ancient tyrant Ngoubou.

0.0: Decreases Gliding Stamina consumption by 15%. When using Aimed Shots, the DMG dealt by Charged Attacks increases by <cryo>6%</cryo> every 0.5s. This effect can stack up to 6 times and will be removed 10s after leaving Aiming Mode.

1.0: Decreases Gliding Stamina consumption by 15%. When using Aimed Shots, the DMG dealt by Charged Attacks increases by <cryo>7.5%</cryo> every 0.5s. This effect can stack up to 6 times and will be removed 10s after leaving Aiming Mode.

2.0: Decreases Gliding Stamina consumption by 15%. When using Aimed Shots, the DMG dealt by Charged Attacks increases by <cryo>9%</cryo> every 0.5s. This effect can stack up to 6 times and will be removed 10s after leaving Aiming Mode.

3.0: Decreases Gliding Stamina consumption by 15%. When using Aimed Shots, the DMG dealt by Charged Attacks increases by <cryo>10.5%</cryo> every 0.5s. This effect can stack up to 6 times and will be removed 10s after leaving Aiming Mode.

4.0: Decreases Gliding Stamina consumption by 15%. When using Aimed Shots, the DMG dealt by Charged Attacks increases by <cryo>12%</cryo> every 0.5s. This effect can stack up to 6 times and will be removed 10s after leaving Aiming Mode.
